Step Forward
From The Challenge: A great opportunity
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
This time last year, you were about to complete NCS with The Challenge.
We imagine a lot has changed for you since then, and things are unlikely to slow down over the next year.
So whilst you’re probably excited about finishing school or college, there are a lot of things to consider about your future. In today’s competitive job market, it’s more important than ever to start your career journey right.
That’s why we want to tell you about a great opportunity called Step Forward; It’s your chance to discover the path that’s suited to you.
What is it?
Step Forward is a London based programme which provides school and college leavers with a chance to spend a year in the world of work with a top quality employer. As a Step Forward Associate, you’ll get invaluable experience, fantastic training and a qualification - all whilst benefiting from the help and advice of an experienced mentor.
Get paid to do real work for a high quality employer, make new friends and develop the skills you’ll need to get ahead in life.
Who’s it for?
Worried about finding a job after university?
Many enthusiastic graduates find it difficult to get a job after university because they lack experience. Step Forward allows you to get invaluable work experience before university to make you more employable when you graduate.
Want a constructive and meaningful Gap Year experience but worried about the cost?
With Step Forward you’ll get paid £9,000 over the year, giving you financial freedom. You’ll also make lasting friendships with others who are on the programme sharing the experience with you.
Want to keep your options open, but don’t know how?
Step Forward will provide you with your own professional mentor who will assist and support you as you find the right path for you. This could mean helping to improve a UCAS application or preparing for an interview.
Want the independence of working but unsure how to progress in your career?
Step Forward is your opportunity to fast track your future giving you the skills and experience to succeed, and allows you to develop the professional networks you need to get ahead in the world of work.
Want to be sure that you’re beginning your career in the best possible way?
It’s easy to start following a career path that isn’t all you expected it would be. Step Forward allows you to spend a year trying something new, whilst gaining valuable transferable skills for any future career.
As a graduate of NCS with The Challenge, you have the exclusive option of applying to Step Forward before others even hear about it.
If this sounds like an option that you want to hear more about, express your interest with your unique form Here.
For more information, please visit www.stepforward.uk.com.
Alternatively, you can apply Now to be considered for our next assessment event in October half term. Step Forward is a competitive programme, and places are limited so avoid missing out on this opportunity by applying as soon as possible.
Best wishes,
WWW.STEPFORWARD.UK.COM /thestepforward
